entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:49 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 11:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
